MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G43 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:05pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Cogan Street substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33pm on Monday, 14 December 2020
